description: Access real-time and historical market data for China A-shares and Hong Kong stocks, along with news and macro indicators. Retrieve financial statements, key ratios, shareholder and insider activity, sentiment analysis, and company profiles to power investment research and strategies.

capabilities.name: get_hist_data
capabilities.description: 获取指定的股票历史行情数据及技术指标

capabilities.name: get_realtime_data
capabilities.description: 获取指定的股票实时行情数据

capabilities.name: get_news_data
capabilities.description: 获取股票相关的新闻数据

capabilities.name: get_balance_sheet
capabilities.description: 获取公司的资产负债表

capabilities.name: get_income_statement
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票代码的公司的利润表

capabilities.name: get_cash_flow
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票代码的公司的现金流量表

capabilities.name: get_fund_flow
capabilities.description: 获取股票资金流向数据 (近100交易日)

capabilities.name: get_inner_trade_data
capabilities.description: 获取公司内部股东交易数据

capabilities.name: get_financial_metrics
capabilities.description: 获取公司关键财务指标

capabilities.name: get_time_info
capabilities.description: 获取当前时间（ISO格式、时间戳）和最近一个交易日

capabilities.name: get_stock_basic_info
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票的基本概要信息

capabilities.name: get_macro_data
capabilities.description: 获取宏观经济指标数据，支持多个指标

capabilities.name: get_investor_sentiment
capabilities.description: 分析投资者情绪数据，包括用户关注指数、日度市场参与意愿、股票评级记录和机构参与度。

capabilities.name: get_shareholder_info
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票的股东情况

capabilities.name: get_product_info
capabilities.description: 获取公司主要产品/业务构成

capabilities.name: get_profit_forecast
capabilities.description: 获取股票的业绩预测数据，包括预测年报净利润和每股收益

capabilities.name: get_stock_fhps_detail
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票的分红配送情况

capabilities.name: get_stock_cyq
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票的筹码分布情况

capabilities.name: get_stock_research_report
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票的个股研报及盈利预测

capabilities.name: get_stock_circulate_stock_holder
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票的流通股东情况

capabilities.name: get_stock_management_change
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票的高管持股变动情况

capabilities.name: get_stock_restricted_release_queue
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票的个股限售解禁情况

capabilities.name: get_stock_value
capabilities.description: 获取指定股票的个股估值分析数据

capabilities.name: get_stock_a_code_name
capabilities.description: 获取沪深京 A 股股票代码和股票简称数据

capabilities.name: get_stock_volatility
capabilities.description: 通过分钟级历史行情计算指定个股的波动率指标

capabilities.name: get_all_cni_indices
capabilities.description: 获取所有指数的代码和基本信息

capabilities.name: get_cni_index_hist
capabilities.description: 获取指定指数的日频率历史行情数据

capabilities.name: get_cni_index_detail
capabilities.description: 获取指定指数的成分股样本详情

capabilities.name: get_stock_technical_rank
capabilities.description: 获取技术选股指标数据，包括创新高、创新低、连续上涨、连续下跌、持续放量、持续缩量、向上突破、向下突破、量价齐升、量价齐跌、险资举牌。

capabilities.name: get_stock_board_industry_summary
capabilities.description: 获取所有行业板块实时行情数据
